agent_id.description: The id of the first agent who picked up the call

call_charge.description: Total charge for the call. String representation of a decimal number with six decimal places. Example: "1.230000". Null if no charge was received from Twilio

call_group_id.description: The id number of the group the call was last placed in before completion.

call_recording_consent.description: Call recording consent value configured for the phone number

call_recording_consent_action.description: Keypress the caller chose to give their call recording consent option.

callback.description: True if the call was initiated by a callback request from the customer

callback_source.description: The source of the callback request

consultation_time.description: Sum of how long in seconds agents consulted with each other while the customer was on hold

created_at.description: When the call object was created

customer_requested_voicemail.description: The customer requested to be directed to voicemail instead of waiting for an agent to answer

default_group.description: The call was answered by an agent who is a member of the call's default group, if group routing is used

direction.description: Inbound or outbound. The agent or customer who initialized the call

exceeded_queue_time.description: The customer exceeded the maximum queue wait time and did not speak with an agent

hold_time.description: Sum of how long in seconds the customer was placed on hold by an agent(s)

ivr_action.description: Menu action that was used by the caller in the IVR menu selection

ivr_destination_group_name.description: Name of the group that received the call through IVR routing. null if IVR is disabled

ivr_hops.description: How many menu options the customer went through in IVR before talking to an agent. null if IVR is disabled

ivr_routed_to.description: Phone number where call was routed to by IVR. Example: "+1311123456789". null if IVR is disabled

ivr_time_spent.description: How long in seconds the customer spent in IVR. Null if IVR is disabled

not_recording_time.description: How long in seconds spent not recording on the call

outside_business_hours.description: The call was received outside business hours

overflowed_to.description: The phone number that the call overflowed to. null if overflowed is false

phone_number.description: Talk phone associated with the call. Example: "+1311123456789"

quality_issues.description: A summary of the call's quality issues related to the call provided to Zendesk from Twilio. Until the information is made available by Twilio, the array contains "information_not_available". If there are no issues, the array contains "none". Other possible values: one or more of "silence", "high_jitter", "high_packet_loss", "high_pdd", "high_latency"

recording_control_interactions.description: The amount of times agents have paused or resumed a recording on the call.

recording_time.description: How long in seconds spent recording on the call

talk_time.description: Sum of how long in seconds the customer was in conference with an agent(s). If a call is not accepted by an agent this will be 0

ticket_id.description: The id of the ticket related to the call

time_to_answer.description: How long in seconds the customer waited for an agent to answer after hearing the Available agents greeting

updated_at.description: When the call object was last created

voicemail.description: If true, the call was a voicemail

wait_time.description: How long in seconds the customer was in the call before an agent answered

wrap_up_time.description: Sum of how long in seconds the agent(s) spent in wrap up
